Zak’s Dad.definition:
A [scrumptious] fella, who has a giant shlong, he is thiccums and has two [watermelons] for testicles (for self defence purposes).
P.s. he smells really nice [mmmmmmmmmmm]
Zak’s Dad.example:
Guy 1: “Woah, who’s that [over there]?”

Guy 2: “[Ohhhh], that’s Zak’s Dad!”

Guy 1: “Damn… I [wanna fuck] Zak’s Dad”

zanika.definition: Greatest person you'll ever meet. Creative AF. Loves her friends and they [absolutely] adore her perfect hair.. err I mean [personality]. Yes. She's amazingly [intelligent] and gorgeous even so.
zanika.example: You are [perfect] Zanika. I love your [perfectly], [amazing], glossy hair.

Zagreb.definition: n. A stranger who suddenly clutches an intimate part of [your body] [and then] pretends they did it to prevent themselves falling. - Coined by [Douglas Adams] & John Lloyd in The Deeper Meaning of Liff.
Zagreb.example: There was this zagreb [on the bus] [today] -  I [had to] slap him to make him stop.
